english.segment1: only through struggle have i found rest. with a piece of me taken away. i begin to understand. hollow out this machine like chest. with its gears that turn to make me feel. and assembled thoughts that fade away
english.segment2: only through struggle have i found rest. only through struggle have i found rest
english.segment3: remove from me. this deception that i called love
english.segment4: with its gears that turn to make me feel. and assembled thoughts that fade away
english.segment5: remove from me. this deception that i called love
english.segment6: only through struggle have i found rest. with a piece of me taken away. i begin to understand. i begin to understand. i begin to understand
